Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, interior slightly grooved and spotted with an off-white deposit, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text, identifying contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393132) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393132)
